name: Catachan Jungle Fighters

unit_rules.name: Jungle Fighters
unit_rules.text: Whenever this unit makes a Charge move, or is the target of a successful Charge move, until the end of the Battle Round, improve the Strength and Armor Break traits of its melee weapons by 1.

composition: 1-2 Jungle Fighter Sergeants (1 per 9 Jungle Fighters)
additional_gear: Shock Trooper Sergeants have their lasgun replaced with a laspistol
Every 10th model (not a Sergeant) is equipped with a Vox-Caster
Every 5th model (not a Sergeant) can have its Lasgun replaced with a Flamer
